name: Gremlin Collection 1
storyline:
Actua Soccer
Actua Soccer comes to Evercade. The first of the Actua Series from Gremlin and one of the first 3D soccer simulations, and including commentary from the legendary Barry Davies.

Brain Bender
Bounce your laser beam around 120 levels in this challenging puzzler from Gremlin. Brain Bender brings 8-bit puzzle action from handhelds past to Evercade.

Hardcore 4X4
A full 3D Off-Road racing gem from Gremlin, Hardcore 4X4 brings all the thrills and spills of racing in treacherous conditions to your Evercade device.

Premier Manager 97
You’ve proven yourself on the field — but how will you do in the manager’s hot seat? Premier Manager 97 from Gremlin brings that addictive one more match feel to your Evercade!

Utopia: The Creation Of A Nation
Run the colony and prosper with Utopia: The Creation of a Nation. This great strategy game from Gremlin stands the test of time on Evercade but will you as a leader?

Zool
The classic franchise from Gremlin, the ever-popular platformer Zool comes to Evercade in its 16-bit form.
summary:
Evercade is delighted to announce another new collection for the Evercade family of systems, and another new publisher for 2022!

The Nth Dimension is coming to Evercade with Gremlin Collection 1, featuring 6 excellent 8, 16 and 32-bit games from the iconic British developer and publisher.

With the collection to be labeled number 24, this will be the second cartridge in our 2022 lineup with the release scheduled for March 2022. Pre-orders for this cartridge open on December 15th 2021 along with Renovation Collection 1 (23).

The six games we’ve chosen for this collection are a great snapshot of the near two decades that Gremlin Graphics and Gremlin Interactive developed and released games for the home console markets, including some great platform, sports, and strategy games that the company became world-renowned for.

The games list is:

• Actua Soccer
• Brain Bender
• Hardcore 4X4 (Saturn)
• Premier Manager 97
• Utopia: The Creation of a Nation
• Zool
